Reviews.Title: Kitchen Microwave Interferes with SW232-M33
Reviews.Author: R. LEE "QKRS WEB"
Reviews.Content: Low-budget 2.4 GHz digital receiver allowed setup of (4) different frequencies to receive remote camera standard digital video:2.414 MHz, 2.432 MHz, 2.450 MHz, and 2.468 MHzUnfortunately, none of the frequencies were clear from microwave oven interference in our office kitchen.I have since upgraded to the Swann SW322-YDW DGTL Wireless Camera and Receiver receiver + wireless camera kit - and finally, a perfect picture of just who is raiding the fridge and stealing from my yogurt stash.Live and learn ...

ProductInfo.Features:
Small size means this camera can be placed or concealed almost anywhere
Enhanced range and color video images make it easy to see what is going on
Receiver can be connected to DVR, VCR, TV, LCD monitor or PC (sold separately) for convenience
Ideal for a baby nursery, monitoring business transactions, even checking for leaves in the gutters!
ProductInfo.Name: Swann Microcam 3.3 Wireless Security Camera
